articles.title: Singapore announces bid to host World Athletics Championships in 2025 - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Singapore is bidding to host the World Athletics Championships in 2025, Sport Singapore (SportSG) announced on Thursday (Mar 17). 

If successful, this would be the first time the championships will be held in Southeast Asia. Previous hosts of th…
